caption: RPG Attribute Dictionary
description: The Attribute Dictionary for the RPG extension.

alpha_extra.description: The alpha extra. Extra stuff for alpha. This is for testing.

damage_range.description: The amount of damage an item can inflict, represented as a string.

mana.description: Current mana, a measure of magical reserves.

entity_thing_t.caption: Entity Thing
entity_thing_t.description: An entity's thingy that's made an observable by type in the RPG extension.

hp_t.description: Hit points are a measure of the ability to take damage.

mana_t.caption: Mana type
mana_t.description: Mana is a measure of magical reserves.
